intro: Paracyclea sutchuenensis, commonly known as the Sichuan paracyclea, is a flowering plant native to China. It belongs to the family Polygonaceae, commonly known as the buckwheat family. The plant is characterized by its upright stems and clusters of small, greenish-white flowers. It typically grows in moist, shaded environments such as mountainous regions. Paracyclea sutchuenensis is valued for its ornamental appeal and has been studied for its potential medicinal properties.
